text: Jiří Načeradský (9 September 1939 - 16 April 2014) was a Czech painter, graphic artist and educator. He was best known for his human figures, sometimes with erotic and sexual subtext and context. He was born in Sedlec- Prčice, Příbram District, Czechoslovakia. Načeradský died on 16 April 2014 in Prague, Czech Republic, aged 74. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Jiří Načeradský at Databáze Národní knihovny ČR Category:1942 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Czech educators Category:Czech painters
title: Jiří Načeradský
